articles.title: NHS chief executive Amanda Pritchard stepping down

articles.description: Campbell Scott disappeared from a luxury hotel before being found miles outside Nairobi by a cattle herder.
articles.title: Campbell Scott: Murdered businessman's body found in sack in Kenya

articles.description: The UK and France abstain as the UN Security Council passes a text that does not criticise Moscow.
articles.title: US sides with Russia in UN resolutions on invasion of Ukraine

articles.description: In January 2024, Baby Elsa was left in a carrier bag by a footpath shortly after she was born.
articles.title: Baby Elsa: Abandoned girl's progress 'astonishing', court hears

articles.title: Kate Bush and other artists protest AI copyright laws with silent album

articles.description: The regulator will outline the change in gas and electricity prices from April, affecting 26 million households.
articles.title: Energy costs likely to rise under Ofgem's new price cap

articles.title: Confusion over Musk demand that federal workers justify their jobs

articles.description: The Crime and Policing Bill will be given officers powers to clean up towns and cities, the Home Secretary says.
articles.title: Flagship crime plan unveiled by government
